<p><b>Note:</b> The element will not take up any space when the display property set to "none".</p>

<script>
function myFunction() {
    var x = document.getElementById("myDIV");
    if (x.style.display === "none") {
        x.style.display = "block";
    } else {
        x.style.display = "none";
    }
}
</script>
